Uses of Class
com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder.BasicStrokeBuilder

  • Packages that use BasicStrokeBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder  

    • Uses of BasicStrokeBuilder in com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder that return BasicStrokeBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BasicStrokeBuilder BasicStrokeBuilder.ofWidth(float width)
      Specifies the width, in pixels, of the stroke.
      static BasicStrokeBuilder StrokeBuilder.withBasicStroke()
      Builds a basic stroke.
      BasicStrokeBuilder BasicStrokeBuilder.withBevelJoin()
      Joins path segments by connecting the outer corners of their wide outlines with a straight segment.
      BasicStrokeBuilder BasicStrokeBuilder.withButtCap()
      Ends unclosed subpaths and dash segments with no added decoration.
      BasicStrokeBuilder BasicStrokeBuilder.withDash(float dashLength)
      Adds a dash pattern element to the stroke.
      BasicStrokeBuilder BasicStrokeBuilder.withDashPhase(float dashPhase)
      The offset at which to start the dashing pattern.
      BasicStrokeBuilder BasicStrokeBuilder.withMiterJoin()
      Joins path segments by extending their outside edges until they meet.
      BasicStrokeBuilder BasicStrokeBuilder.withMiterLimit(float miterLimit)
      The limit to trim the miter join; must be greater than or equal to 1.0f.
      BasicStrokeBuilder BasicStrokeBuilder.withRoundCap()
      Ends unclosed subpaths and dash segments with a round decoration that has a radius equal to half of the width of the pen.
      BasicStrokeBuilder BasicStrokeBuilder.withRoundJoin()
      Joins path segments by rounding off the corner at a radius of half the line width.
      BasicStrokeBuilder BasicStrokeBuilder.withSquareCap()
      Ends unclosed subpaths and dash segments with a square projection that extends beyond the end of the segment to a distance equal to half of the line width.
